column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=If you had complete power at this moment , what would you do ?
#Text=How would you change America ?

#Text=If this means complete power , as opposed to having to deal with the checks and balances built into our federal government , this is some of what I 'd do : I 'd end abortion and all the precipitating factors leading to it ( poverty , dysfunctional family dynamics , relaxed sexual mores , alcohol and drug addiction ... ) .
#Text=I 'd mobilize a set of dramatic initiatives to , not just curb global warming , but to actually start to reverse it .
#Text=I would unilaterally disarm our nuclear weapons .
#Text=I 'd stop the production of nuclear energy .
#Text=( Anybody hear of Chernobyl ? )
#Text=I would grant amnesty and family reunification to illegal immigrants .

#Text=( During a talk at an immigration rally in Arizona several years ago , I said we walked through the slums of Juarez , where violence is off the charts and many of the children are extremely hungry .
#Text=If I was their parent , I 'd do everything I could to get these children out of harms way and get them something to eat – even if it meant risking crossing the border illegally . )
#Text=I would end the death penalty .
#Text=Also in Arizona , I read a newspaper story about a death penalty protester who posed : “ Why do we kill people who kill people to show that killing people is wrong ? ”
#Text=Good question .

#Text=I would increase , exponentially , American foreign aid ( it is currently only 4 % of the budget ) to try to help stem world hunger much more – 24,000 people starve to death every day in the world – and to help realize Habitat for Humanity 's goal of providing adequate housing , ( “ …for every person in the world . ” )
#Text=I would bring peace to urban war zones around the country .
#Text=( In part of this effort , our family moved into a dangerous part of Cleveland , Ohio , to be part of the solution . )
#Text=I would end homelessness .
#Text=( We take homeless people into our home .
#Text=And we will be doing the same in the West Wing .
#Text=I mean the Lincoln bedroom is free , as an example . )
#Text=I would tremendously jack down and simplify the economy , shifting America back to much more of a local production for local consumption orientation , like it was in the “ old days . ”
#Text=I would mobilize efforts for a tremendous come back of the small family farm and the practice of growing organically .
#Text=This was once the backbone of our country , I told the newspaper Country Today in Wisconsin .
#Text=And it should be again .
#Text=I would get people to tighten their belts and pay off the National Debt so our children do n't inherit it .

#Text=During a talk at the University of Notre Dame recently , I said I would redirect the technical smarts at NASA toward coming up with better water filtration systems , solar panels , wind turbines ... , as opposed to working on things like going to space destinations where we : ca n't breathe the air , there 's no gravity and there 's no food ! “
#Text=That might be , oh , a hint God does n't want us there , ” I said .
#Text=I would give some of the land back to the Native Americans so it 's equitable , like it should have been from the beginning .
#Text=And I would give the African Americans tangible reparations for past atrocities and the ongoing trans-generational problems slavery caused .
#Text=And , I would ensure – as impossible as this seems – that the Cleveland Browns had a winning season , soon ...
#Text=For a look at how I would actually try to make a lot of this happen , the Cleveland Browns notwithstanding , go to my rather extensive position papers at
